definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.chinese: 在拉丁文中，Septem是“七”的意思。

sentences.english: That's the Latin poem that was assigned for today's class.
sentences.chinese: 就是今天这节课我们要学的这首拉丁文诗歌。

sentences.english: The participial constructions are employed much more in Latin than they are in English.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁文较英文有更多使用分词结构的句子。

sentences.english: The language teacher pounds Latin into the heads of students.
sentences.chinese: 语言教师不断地向学生的脑袋灌输拉丁文。

sentences.english: Bernoulli's essay was published in Latin as an article in a scholarlyvolume.[1]
sentences.chinese: 伯努利的论文以拉丁文发表在一个学院刊物上。

sentences.english: The word beer itself comes from a Latin verb meaning "to drink", and the ancient Romans were certainly no strangers to the brew.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒这个词源自拉丁文动词，意为“饮用”。

sentences.english: He took up Latin at the age of six .
sentences.chinese: 他在六岁时就瞥绶学拉丁文。

sentences.english: Thousands of English words are derived from Latin. ;
sentences.chinese: 英语中有不可胜数的词源于拉丁文。

sentences.english: I give the Latin on account of the savoriness of the trivial name.
sentences.chinese: 我把它的拉丁文的学名写下是因为它的俗名不很好。

sentences.english: Latin and Greek authors too were translated into modern languages.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁文和希腊文作家的作品也被译介到现代语言中。

sentences.english: Latin and Chinese descriptions and illustrations are given for the new species.
sentences.chinese: 对新种作了拉丁文及汉文描述和图解。

sentences.english: Some languages, including Latin, have a flexible word order.
sentences.chinese: 一些语言，包括拉丁文，都有灵活的词序变化。

sentences.english: The word ruby comes from the Latin word "ruber" which means red.
sentences.chinese: 红宝石一词源于拉丁文“曲霉”，意思是红色。

sentences.english: So you thought you had no use for Latin in this modern age?
sentences.chinese: 这是什么年头，学拉丁文这些老皇历是没用的？

sentences.english: Their morphological characteristics were described in Chinese and Latin with microscopical photo plates.
sentences.chinese: 其形态特征有汉文和拉丁文描述以及显微照像图版。

sentences.english: The common name for the ingredient is listed first, followed by the Latin, or scientific name.
sentences.chinese: 一些成份的常用名先列出，然后是拉丁文名称或学名。
